meanings.definition: Relating to the stars or celestial bodies.
meanings.sent1: The astronomer studied the astrals in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The telescope allowed us to observe the astrals more clearly.
meanings.sent3: The children made a mobile of the astrals to hang in their room.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were filled with the astrals, shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut marveled at the beauty of the astrals from space.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the soul or spirit.
meanings.sent1: The wise old man had a deep connection to the astrals within.
meanings.sent2: Meditation helped her explore the astrals of her inner self.
meanings.sent3: The ghostly figure seemed to be made of astrals, floating eerily.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was light and airy, like the touch of astrals.
meanings.sent5: The music resonated with the astrals of the audience, lifting their spirits.

meanings.definition: A person who believes in or practices astral projection.
meanings.sent1: The astrals guided him through his out-of-body experience.
meanings.sent2: She met other astrals during her astral projection journey.
meanings.sent3: The astrals gathered for a meeting in the astral realm.
meanings.sent4: The astrals shared stories of their astral travels with each other.
meanings.sent5: Becoming an astrals opened up a new world of exploration for him.
